=== Summary ===

Hal is in the process of being deprecated, since it has become a large
monolithic unmaintainable mess, and also duplicates a lot of functionality
which are nowadays provided by udev and the kernel itself. Please see
<nowiki>[[http://lists.freedesktop.org/archives/hal/2008-May/011560.html|David Zeuthen's]]</nowiki> and
<nowiki>[[http://lists.freedesktop.org/archives/devkit-devel/2009-April/000140.html|Kay Siever's]]</nowiki>
summaries of plans.

Tracker bug for Gnome related packages: <nowiki>[[https://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=593938]]</nowiki>
